website_summaries.verdict: Lenovo's Tab 4 10 tablet offers great battery life, but its display quality is behind the times.

customer_reviews.title: Fit for my purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Use this tablet to watch videos during my commute to work. Happy as battery last long and discharge very little when not in use. This was my main issue with my previous tablet as when was going to use it after the weekend, the battery was empty. The internal 16GB storage is just enough but will expand with an SD card so can hold more videos.
customer_reviews.author: R. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very Good quality tablet
customer_reviews.text: I think it is an excellent tablet all the films and TV work very well Good quality and the sound is great I would recommend very happy at a amazing price
customer_reviews.author: Quantummodz

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable  Product
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was excellent. The product is fine, although the charger link often is very difficult to fit and the supplier could not help me get an extra charger. But overall a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Halpin

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tablet: lightweight, good display, good battery life. The only two things that let it down for me are the absence of automatic display brightness and NFC.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet and a fraction of the price as my old iPad. Battery life is far better than the iPad as well
customer_reviews.author: sharon mckinnel

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet it does everything I want to do .So far the battery is great I hope it stays that way . My previous Lenovo battery started to malfunction after a few months
customer_reviews.author: nozza

customer_reviews.title: A steal!
customer_reviews.text: I got this when it was on a crazy offer, so would rate it 10* value for money. Not a top end tablet but really nice build quality for its price bracket. Battery life is decent but I don't really use anything to graphically intensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: a decent 10" tablet for £140
customer_reviews.text: If you want to watch sky/amazon/bbc i player etc on a decent size screen with fairly good sound then this will do it without issues
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this tablet especially for the price, it does everything I need it to. The camera is poor but i dont use the camera. Only issue is the length of time it takes to turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than two weeks before it broke.
customer_reviews.text: Used very lightly for two weeks and now it won't switch on. Charging displays fully charged but the on button does not work at all. Avoid at all costs, extremely poor quality device.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Spurr

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It's for my brother who knows very little about tablet, but he finds it so easy to work with and it's of good value.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Recommendation for Lenovo Tab 4 10 10.1
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this tablet - the sound quality could be improved. But overall very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my tired Lenovo Yoga. How tech has moved on. I was able to set up the Tab 4 the way I wanted it without any screaming or swearing, and was surprised to find that a movie and music I'd bought on the Yoga were present on the Tab 4. The battery life is impressive, and I like the double tap on the screen to wake it up, and the touchpal keyboard allows different keyboard set ups. Alexa is also onboard. It's very user friendly, and the Tab 4 does everything I need.Very happy that I chose this tablet, excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Titania

customer_reviews.title: pictures go to error i thought it came in set ...
customer_reviews.text: pictures go to error i thought it came in set and glass and houses and keyboard
customer_reviews.author: hymalaya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren are over the moon with their tablet and cover
customer_reviews.author: Elske

product_meta.title: Lenovo TAB 4 10 10.1 inches IPS Tablet PC - (Slate Black) (Qualcomm MSM8917 1.4 GHz, 2 GB RAM, Android 7.0)
product_meta.description:
The Lenovo Tab 4 10 is the first tablet to hide many tablets in one. It delivers a great multimedia experience in an amazing design hiding high-end specifications. It has you covered beyond what other slate tablets offer by helping you secure your data with m lute-user and multi-space functionality. The Tab 4 10 reinvents the slate tablet, by becoming better with a choice of packs.

BOX CONTAINS
Tablet
Adaptor
USB Cable
Warranty Card
Quickstart Guide
feature_bullets: Brilliant HD display - Enjoy a solid visual experience with the 10.1" HD display, which gives your photos and movies a vibrant feel that you’ll want to share with the entire family.
Cinema-worthy sound - Make the most of your cinema therapy because Tab 4 10 contains two high-quality speakers that will really make your TV shows and movies pop.
Easy sharing - Someone other than you using your device? The Tab 4 10 makes user sharing a breeze, each with their own dedicated profile, interface and storage.
Immersive entertainment - Immerse yourself in deep, booming Dolby Atoms sound that delivers a theatre-like experience for watching movies and shows.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars46 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
